wbtl.app

A collection of useful tools that run entirely in your browser. No server needed, no tracking, no ads.

100% Local No Tracking Free Forever
Timer
timer.wbtl.app

Countdown timer with various options to customize it to your liking. Set duration, alerts, and more.
Soundcheck
soundcheck.wbtl.app

Test your audio output and microphone. Check loudness levels and select input devices to ensure everything works.
Bionic Reading
bionic.wbtl.app

Convert text to bionic reading format. Bold the first part of words to help you read faster and with better focus.
Colorpicker
colorpicker.wbtl.app

Pick colors from anywhere on your screen, convert between formats, and build beautiful color palettes.
Word Count
wordcount.wbtl.app

Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs in your text. Get reading time estimates and more.
Webcam Test
webcamtest.wbtl.app

Test your webcam and check video quality, resolution, and frame rate before your next call.
Password Generator
passwordgenerator.wbtl.app

Generate secure, random passwords with customizable length and character options.
JSON Formatter
jsonformatter.wbtl.app

Format, validate, and minify JSON data with syntax highlighting and error detection.
QR Code
qrcode.wbtl.app

Generate and scan QR codes. Create codes from text or URLs, and decode from camera or images.
Tuner
tuner.wbtl.app

Tune your instrument using your microphone. Accurate pitch detection for guitar, ukulele, and more.
Standup Timer
standup.wbtl.app

Keep standups on track with per-person timers and automatic rotation through your team.
Contrast Checker
contrast.wbtl.app

Check color contrast ratios for WCAG accessibility compliance. Test text and background combinations.
OCR
ocr.wbtl.app

Extract text from images using local OCR. No uploads, all processing happens in your browser.
Pomodoro
pomodoro.wbtl.app

Stay focused with the Pomodoro technique. Work in timed intervals with short breaks in between.
PDF Merger
pdfmerger.wbtl.app

Merge, split, and rearrange PDF files. All processing happens locally in your browser.
Remove Background
removebg.wbtl.app

Remove backgrounds from images using AI. All processing happens locally in your browser.
Lorem Generator
loremgen.wbtl.app

Generate placeholder text. Lorem ipsum, random words, names, and more for your designs.
Hash Generator
hashgen.wbtl.app

Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, and other hashes from text or files. All processing is local.
Screen Info
screeninfo.wbtl.app

Display your screen resolution, pixel ratio, color depth, and other display information.
Key Code
keycode.wbtl.app

Press any key to see its JavaScript keycode, key value, and code. Essential for developers.
UUID Generator
uuidgen.wbtl.app

Generate UUIDs (v1, v4, v7) with bulk generation option. Copy with one click.
Slugify
slugify.wbtl.app

Convert text to URL-friendly slugs. Remove special characters and format for web addresses.
Stopwatch
stopwatch.wbtl.app

Precise stopwatch with lap times and history. Track multiple intervals with ease.
Image Editor
imgedit.wbtl.app

Resize, crop, rotate, and apply filters to images. All editing happens locally in your browser.
Randomizer
randomizer.wbtl.app

Pick random items from a list, shuffle, roll dice, or make weighted selections.
JWT Decode
jwtdecode.wbtl.app

Decode and inspect JWT tokens without sending them anywhere. View header, payload, and signature.

Open Source

Want a new tool or have an improvement? Request features or contribute directly on GitHub.
